originalText.text: Harlem Brain is a gift to New York and Isabel (founder) is one of the most kind and wonderful humans I've ever met! I'm so glad and grateful that I discovered Harlem Brain earlier this year. I attended a Full Moon Sound Healing Workshop at the end of November of the year and I had the most wonderful experience! I needed to release a lot of trapped energy that was weighing on me and the session that Isabel facilitated was so healing. The music of the sound bowls was incredible, and I absolutely loved sharing my experience with the others in the class. I will definitely be attending another workshop, and I highly recommend these workshops as well as the other services that are offered! Thank you Isabel!

originalText.text: Harlem Brain has helped me so much through my healing journey.  I am so grateful to Isabel and the private classes that have been crucial to my healing. The group classes are wonderful, the energy is great and I highly recommend checking it out!

text.text: Harlem Brain has helped me so much through my healing journey.  I am so grateful to Isabel and the private classes that have been crucial to my healing. The group classes are wonderful, the energy is great and I highly recommend checking it out!

originalText.text: I had no idea the jackpot I stumbled on when I found Harlem Brain. I was looking to try neurofeedback and what I got was so much more. Isabel, the founder is so knowledgeable and friendly it made my experience very enjoyable. I had a limited amount of time and I wanted to squeeze 10 sessions in before I went out of town. When I reached out to find out if that was possible Isabel got me started right away the next day and had 10 sessions scheduled for me before the end of the day to make sure we could get it done. I was able to find free parallel parking on either side street every time without too much trouble. I would highly recommend Harlem brain for Neurofeedback as well as anyone looking for holistic mind-body classes and resources.

originalText.text: Harlem Brain is a special gem dedicated to helping you get your energy aligned! So grateful to have found this place and Isabel. It’s great having a place to go to stretch your body and your mind right here in Harlem!!

text.text: Harlem Brain is a special gem dedicated to helping you get your energy aligned! So grateful to have found this place and Isabel. It’s great having a place to go to stretch your body and your mind right here in Harlem!!

originalText.text: Coming to this center was one of the best decisions I’ve ever made for myself. From the first time I walked into the center, I felt like I finally found what I was looking for. Before I joined the center, I was seeking treatment for anxiety and stress reduction and I knew that I didn’t want to take the traditional route that’s usually  recommended like medication or seeking a therapist. The training that I received from the Harlem Brain center is so unique and transformative that it naturally helped me overcome anxiety, created belonging within myself, and showed me that I have control over my body. I left every session feeling empowered and it gave me another reason to continue trying even if it was difficult. Training with Isabel, the head master, made such a huge impact on my life and I am grateful that I decided to signup for individual healing sessions and group classes! It was totally worth the investment! I’m no longer afraid of life or living with constant anxiety, I feel alive and excited for what’s to come. If you’re thinking about coming to the center, please give it a chance.
